app_detail:
An accurate Android™ taximeter designed in conjunction with drivers and regulators. Join the thousands of professional drivers already using Taximeter worldwide.


🚖 FEATURES

✔  Realistic “LED effect” appearance and operation
✔  More than 200 predefined presets in over 40 countries ( Link: http://www.planetcoops.com/apps/taximeter/presets.pdf )
✔  Latest presets can be downloaded from the internet and Planet Coops will add your rates free of charge for your drivers to download
✔  Customizable preset with up to 10 tariffs
✔  Custom preset wizard for easy setup
✔  Lockable preset/settings
✔  Calendar controlled (with tariff auto-switch) or manual tariffs
✔  Location controlled tariffs (geofencing)
✔  Ahead-of-time programming of future tariffs
✔  Extras (itemized extras can be programmed via XML)
✔  Minimum fare
✔  Tax
✔  Discounts
✔  Tips
✔  Yards/meters units
✔  Hire log (text and/or csv format) with automatic send via email
💳 Integration with PayPal Here™, Square Point of Sale™ or SumUp™ payment processing
✔  Generate a PDF receipt which can be emailed or printed through the Android Print Service (Android KitKat or later required). Links can be sent via SMS or viewed as a QR code when cloud storage is enabled.
✔  Receipt printing (Planet Coops’ POS Print application and a compatible Bluetooth mobile printer are required)
💡 Roof light control (a compatible Bluetooth switch is required)
✔  Event log with alerts
✔  Resettable totals
✔  Talking taximeter for the sight impaired
✔  Use On-Board Diagnostics (OBD) speed data to calculate distance instead of GPS (an OBD-II compliant vehicle and an ELM327 compatible Bluetooth, Wi-Fi or USB OBD-II adapter are required. If you are planning to use a USB adapter check that your device is running Android™ 3.1+ and supports USB host mode.)
✔  OBD calibration function
✔  Support for wireless GPS receivers
✔  Use the Preset Update Service https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.planetcoops.android.presetupdater to automatically keep your rates up-to-date
✔  Data logging - log GPS position, meter state and fares to the cloud (incurs a small monthly charge to contribute to server costs). A basic online tracking facility is available should you choose this option.
✔  API for integration with third party dispatch systems. Remote API access from different devices on the same network is possible using the Taximeter Proxy Service https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.planetcoops.android.taximeterproxyservice.
✔  Backup and restore settings
✔  Supports Samsung Multi Window™, LG Dual Window™ & Android™ Multi-Window
✔  Screen saver
✔  Floating widget
✔  User guide ( Link: http://www.planetcoops.com/apps/taximeter/taximeter.pdf )

🚖 APPLICATIONS

•  Private hire
•  Medical transportation
•  Limousine
•  Courier
•  Airport transfers
•  Avoid being ripped off overseas
•  Carpooling
•  Family "taxi"

Visit our website, Link: http://taximeter.planetcoops.com, for the user guide and preset information...
